articles.description: Ballot measures were approved in California to restrict commercial use of user data and in Michigan to require warrants for searches of electronic information.
articles.content: As the most important outcome of the 2020 election remains in flux, voters in California and Michigan approved new privacy laws Tuesday: Californias Prop 24, which extends provisions of a 2018 privac… [+4242 chars]

articles.author: Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: China's yuan has its worst fall in years before recovering on US election swings - CNN
articles.description: The US presidential election is far from decided. But Chinese markets were jittery overnight about the possibility that President Donald Trump could pull out a second term.
